name: dmri_paths
description: Tool for diffusion MRI path analysis.

inputs.name: Input Subject Directory
inputs.description: Input subject directory (optional), specify multiple for longitudinal data.

inputs.name: Output Directory
inputs.description: Output directory (one per path).

inputs.name: DWI Volume Series
inputs.description: DWI volume series.

inputs.name: Diffusion Gradients
inputs.description: Text file of diffusion gradients.

inputs.name: Diffusion b-values
inputs.description: Text file of diffusion b-values.

inputs.name: Mask Volume
inputs.description: Mask volume.

inputs.name: BEDPOST Directory
inputs.description: BEDPOST directory.

inputs.name: Max Number of Tracts per Voxel
inputs.description: Max number of tracts per voxel (default 1).

inputs.name: Tract Volume Fraction Threshold
inputs.description: Tract volume fraction threshold (default 0).

inputs.name: Base-to-DWI Registration
inputs.description: Base-to-DWI registration, needed for longitudinal data only (.mat, as many as input directories).

inputs.name: Base Template Mask Volume
inputs.description: Base template mask volume.

inputs.name: End ROI 1
inputs.description: End ROI 1 (volume or label, one per path).

inputs.name: End ROI 2
inputs.description: End ROI 2 (volume or label, one per path).

inputs.name: Mesh for End ROI 1
inputs.description: Mesh for end ROI 1 (for label ROIs).

inputs.name: Mesh for End ROI 2
inputs.description: Mesh for end ROI 2 (for label ROIs).

inputs.name: Reference Volume for End ROI 1
inputs.description: Reference volume for end ROI 1 (for label ROIs).

inputs.name: Reference Volume for End ROI 2
inputs.description: Reference volume for end ROI 2 (for label ROIs).

inputs.name: Spatial Path Priors
inputs.description: Spatial path priors (negative log-likelihoods off and on the path, one pair per path).

inputs.name: Near-neighbor Label Priors
inputs.description: Near-neighbor label priors (negative log-likelihood and list of labels, one pair per path).

inputs.name: Subset of Near-neighbor Label Priors
inputs.description: Subset of near-neighbor label priors (default all).

inputs.name: Local-neighbor Label Priors
inputs.description: Local-neighbor label priors (negative log-likelihood and list of labels, one pair per path).

inputs.name: Subset of Local-neighbor Label Priors
inputs.description: Subset of local-neighbor label priors (default all).

inputs.name: Segmentation Map
inputs.description: Segmentation map of test subject, specify multiple for longitudinal data.

inputs.name: Path Tangent Vector Priors
inputs.description: Path tangent vector priors (negative log-likelihood, one per path).

inputs.name: Path Curvature Priors
inputs.description: Path curvature priors (negative log-likelihood, one per path).

inputs.name: DWI-to-Atlas Affine Registration
inputs.description: DWI-to-atlas affine registration (.mat).

inputs.name: DWI-to-Atlas Nonlinear Registration
inputs.description: DWI-to-atlas nonlinear registration (.m3z).

inputs.name: Initial Control Points
inputs.description: Text file of initial control points (one per path).

inputs.name: Number of Burn-in Samples
inputs.description: Number of burn-in samples (default 5000).

inputs.name: Number of Post-burn-in Samples
inputs.description: Number of post-burn-in samples (default 5000).

inputs.name: Sample Interval
inputs.description: Keep every nk-th sample (default 10).

inputs.name: Proposal Update Interval
inputs.description: Update proposal every nu-th sample (default 40).

inputs.name: Initial Proposal SDs
inputs.description: Text file with initial proposal standard deviations for control point perturbations.

inputs.name: Debug Mode
inputs.description: Turn on debugging.

inputs.name: Check Options
inputs.description: Don't run anything, just check options and exit.

inputs.name: Print Version
inputs.description: Print out version and exit.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
